news.title: Hormones and How Women Vote: New Evidence, but No Consensus
news.summary: New research partially rebuts a controversial 2012 paper that linked fertility with the way women vote, but fails to refute the basic premise. Hormones and How Women Vote: New Evidence, but No Consensus was first posted on February 27, 2014 at 2:00 am. ©20
